description.value:
For Kroot, Extremely Rare. A Totem of a Kroothawk, a Kroot Shaper gains an Extra Fate point while carrying it, the Fate Point can be spent but not burnt.

Requirements

Xeno "Tech"

Effect: Near Unique

Notes: -
